casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Glenn Devon McKINNEY. No. 622P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 7, 2005. Paul Herzog, Fayetteville, for Glenn Devon McKinney. R. Stuart Albright, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th day of November 2005 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 7th day of November 2005."
